explanation: [0-0] In front of a black background, a man wearing a red T-shirt sits behind a drum set, his left hand resting on the drum and his right hand holding a small broom with a purple handle. In front of the man is a computer. The content displayed on the computer is shown in the upper right corner of the shot, a small screen showing a woman competing in a curling match.

[0-5] The man in the shot is concentrating on the woman's movements on the computer. He uses the handle of the small broom to draw a semicircle on the drumhead, imitating the sound of the woman pushing the curling stone in the small screen.
